title: What are the impressions and experiences of individuals who have undergone magnetism sessions, and how does it affect their health?
first_phrase: In this text, various individuals share their experiences with mesmerism and the effects it had on them. They describe feeling a force that controlled their actions and state of mind. Despite skepticism surrounding the practice, those who underwent mesmerism attest to its effectiveness. The author mentions how some scientists, despite evidence supporting mesmerism, reject it. The text calls on skeptics to stop denying the benefits of the practice and instead accept the evidence provided by these first-hand accounts.

last_phrase: In conclusion, it is essential to recognize the potential benefits of magnétisme in medicine and the importance of open-mindedness towards this field of study. Through careful observation and analysis of its effects, magnétisme can provide valuable insights into the diagnosis and treatment of illnesses. Rather than dismissing it as a pseudoscience, we should strive to better understand it and its potential benefits, in order to improve medical practice and ultimately benefit the health of individuals.
